test_case.title: Search Icon and Text Verification in the Spotlight Search Field
pre_condition: User has any Mac device with macOS 11 (Big Sur), macOS 12 (Monterey), macOS 13 (Ventura), or macOS 14 (Sonoma) with an operational Spotlight Search.

steps.expected_result: The Spotlight Search opens in the middle of the screen.

steps.action: Verify the visibility of a search icon on the left side of the search field.
steps.expected_result: The search icon is visible on the left side of the search field.

steps.action: Confirm that the text 'Spotlight Search' is displayed adjacent to the search icon.
steps.expected_result: The text 'Spotlight Search' is displayed next to the search icon.

steps.action: Ensure that the search icon and text do not obstruct other elements in the search field.
steps.expected_result: The search icon and text are displayed without obscuring other elements in the search field.
